titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Stephen C. Vladeck Papers WAG.284
titlestmt.author: Maggie Schreiner

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-01-21 16:03:51 -0500.

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

did.abstract: Stephen C. Vladeck was the husband of Judith Vladeck and worked as a labor and civil rights lawyer and collective bargainer in higher education. This collection contains some of Vladeck's personal and professional correspondence from the 1960s to 1970s.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection, created by Stephen Vladeck was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Judith Vladeck in 1992. The accession number associated with this gift is 1992.022.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Stephen C. Vladeck Papers; WAG 284; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Stephen C. Vladeck was the husband of Judith Vladeck and worked as a labor and civil rights lawyer and collective bargainer in higher education. Vladeck was also counsel to and secretary-treasurer of the Peoples Educational Camp Society, an active member of the Tamiment Institute and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives at New York University.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. Materials are in the order in which they were received from the donor.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. Folders and folder titles are original.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains some of Vladeck's personal and professional correspondence from the 1960s to 1970s.

did.unittitle: Correspondence: Personal (Also includes John McLellan and McLellan Committee, Arthur Goldberg and Western Electric)
